page.title: 05Army Ranges at Two Bridges
page.content:
{ {Live Firing Ranges}
The Merrivale firing range is the only one that falls into this area of Dartmoor and this is only in a small area to the North-West of the West Dart River.
The range boundary runs from the North, along the West side of Beardown Tors before running off to the West about half a mile North of the Beardown Hill plantation.
The forces do not use live ammunition on Dartmoor in August and during the rest of the year times and dates of firing are shown in regional papers and in local post offices.
